title: Will the iPhone SE 2 support 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as rumours go, Apple isn’t going to make an iPhone SE2. While yes there has been some speculation in the past week about it happening, it’s very unlikely as the iPhone 7 will be dropping in price so low in the next two weeks, an iPhone SE2 wouldn’t make sense and further complicate Apples’ iPhone lineup. So think of the iPhone 7 as an “SE2”.
